about_the_game:
Ranging from heavy guitars to meditative soundscapes, the Deadliners Soundtrack provides an atmospheric, ambient backdrop that will keep you coming back for more.

The soundtrack consists of 10 tracks from the game Deadliners, and are composed by the audio designer & composer Jonas Kappel Lund.

Complete track list:
- Become The Deadliner
- Who Can Survive
- Enter Darkness
- Headshot Hello
- Dead Lines
- Into Orbit
- Space Travel
- Who Will Win
- Flag Captured
- Final Run

name: Deadliners - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Series (4400+)
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game uses Keyboard or controllers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game uses Keyboard or controllers.
